SENT.plain: Cerebral air embolism may be caused by iatrogenic or post-traumatic introduction of air into arterial or venous systems
It is usually revealed by computerized tomography

In this paper, we report a case with thorax trauma and loss of consciousness, in whom cerebral massive air embolism was detected and its distribution was demonstrated by using 3D spiral CT reconstruction
To our knowledge, this is the first case in whom 3D spiral CT reconstruction was used for demonstration of cerebral arterial air embolism
